column1: Little Goat Diner////We arrived for lunch around 11:45 and we just beat the big rush. Because we were willing to sit at the community table we got a seat right away. The interior of this place is absolutely gorgeous. It's an eclectic mix of muted
column4: mid century elements and natural materials. It's SO bright and airy
column5: just perfect for even a dreary day in the city.
